1.0.name: wordpress/simple-html-slider
1.0.description: =Features = Put any html content with in the slides may be video, images or html itself Adjust the timings at your wish Adjust the flow of the slide i.e. from left to right or top to bottom and so on Pause on hover or not. Above all Free to use Move the slides up and down as you wish. Add as many slides you can.
